text:
[trapit-site-2014/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/558dfc1b3d482e6f5cdaec0bc42aabd62b86580c|558dfc1b3d48>: All White Paper download actions changed to 'Download PDF'
 - jenny_louthan
<@U0260V1BX> the 3 columns under About>Our Story look a bit awkward.
Would it make sense to break the second at "app with the" and move the rest to the next column?
NM, probably not a good idea to break paragraphs. Not very semantic.
i was just looking at that
i think its fine to break mid-paragraph
From a web semantics perspective it's no-no. My bad. Screen readers and other devices will treat that as 2 different paragraphs.
oh yeah?
ok.
that sucks, but makes sense :grinning: let's leave it.

 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/65183cf9c96dd7ddcb368b28a95a565e2a80f9ca|65183cf9c96d>: Added correct icon to Engagement section on homepage.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/57ae19f6447354339760831f6dd64d29b99533de|57ae19f64473>: Careers page type styles.

[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/a4f9b3039b1133c4a93042ced27bab5db550eee8|a4f9b3039b11>: Wired up home hero buttons.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/74ef2ca6a2ea0934198071398d39926eeede87fd|74ef2ca6a2ea>: Merging.
 - gastonfig
WOO HOO
<@U0260V1BX> / <@U0265G76F> Should we consider truncating the title on trap blocks?
A file was shared
think we can truncate at 3 lines
Agreed
also think we need to find alternate shot for about us page
as the guy’s face is completely obscured
i’m currently going back into old trapit shots to see what might work
Roger on truncating at 3 lines.
Yeah I was going for the guys in the right of that shot, but agree its a little weird
I'll find a new one

[trapit-site-2014/] 2 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/4c3af7fa343dad4b8666d39104c5afad96e07f85|4c3af7fa343d>: Using the correct Insight icon on homepage.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/5016f1e1cc4b6fbdaf1c799740b5e7528284d052|5016f1e1cc4b>: Now truncating trap titles. Also, improved truncate function.
 - gastonfig
Team, I was wondering if we have a confirmed launch date? I know it was initially today and we're talking with Trapit dev tomorrow but I can remember if we agreed on a date.
I think they want to flip the switch Tuesday at 7am
so migration and handoff will happen prior to that
Cool. I'm looking at the list of bugs/tasks left vs available time and trying to come up with a plan of attack.

hey there <@U0289USNA> <@U02618EV1> and <@U02613K0X> - Can you peek at the email I just forwarded from the Trapit team? I know there’s some content on the site that is bare because they’ve only published a couple things. 

Sounds like there might be slightly more they’re concerned about.
can we dig into this and see if there’s anything worth noting?
They say some of their published articles aren’t showing up on the demo site...but if you look at the content at their feed urls it’s consistent with what’s on trdev
i.e. whatever articles they think are missing from the demo site appear to be missing from the feed endpoints too

I just had a quick chat with David and it sounds like there're articles missing from the other feeds. It sounds like we may get specific examples of missing articles which we can check against the RSS feed to see where the disconnect is.
yeah that would help
will forward as i find out
Thanks.

 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/5c33ca29f0c7684c644446411c63025ebc7775b2|5c33ca29f0c7>: Using window.width instead of mathMedia test to run flexslider.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/c19051d548eb30f8b90f95d414dd345acaa70597|c19051d548eb>: Wired up mobile form button to the modal.
 - gastonfig
